code: @BeforeClass public static void before() {     final WordpressServiceProvider serviceProvider = WordpressServiceProvider.getInstance().     serviceProvider.init(WordpressTestConstants.WORDPRESS_DEMO_URL).     servicePages = serviceProvider.getService(WordpressServicePages.class). }
@Test public void testRetrieve() {     final Page page = servicePages.retrieve(2, null, null).     assertThat(page, not(nullValue())).     assertThat(page.getId(), is(2)). }

@Test public void testList() {     final PageSearchCriteria criteria = new PageSearchCriteria().     criteria.setPage(1).     criteria.setPerPage(5).     final List<Page> posts = servicePages.list(criteria).     assertThat(posts, is(not(emptyCollectionOf(Page.class)))).     assertThat(posts.size(), is(5)). }
